en.name: Memory of Dust
en.passiveDescription: Increases Shield Strength by {{20%//25%//30%//35%//40%}}. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {{4%//5%//6%//7%//8%}} for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

zh.name: 尘世之锁
zh.passiveDescription: 护盾强效提升{{20%//25%//30%//35%//40%}}。攻击命中后的8秒内，攻击力提升{{4%//5%//6%//7%//8%}}。该效果至多可叠加5层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。此外，处于护盾庇护下时，该效果的攻击力提升效果提高100%。
